amendment.description: Amendment requires the Attorney General to establish a National Gang Intelligence Center and gang information database to be housed at and administered by the Federal Bureau of Investigation to collect, analyze, and disseminate gang activity information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-236 to authorize the FBI National Gang Intelligence Center. It adds $10 million in authorization for the Center for each fiscal year, mirroring the $10 million appropriation given in FY 05.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
